name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Field Engineer with extensive experience in mechanical and electrical engineering, focused on pump technology and health and safety compliance. Proven track record in customer service, ensuring effective communication and collaboration across multidisciplinary teams. Demonstrates strong troubleshooting skills to resolve issues efficiently while maintaining high safety standards.

Possessing digital literacy, adept at utilizing technology to enhance operations. Originally trained as a Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications in various industries. Skilled in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on expertise in frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms, and proficient in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**.
